scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && yarn dev" "cd backend && yarn dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd frontend && yarn start" "cd backend && yarn start"
scripts.build: cd frontend && yarn build && cd ../backend && yarn build
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/.next backend/dist
scripts.install:all: yarn install && cd frontend && yarn install && cd ../backend && yarn install
